mainfeatures: This digital camera is designed with small size and it is easy to carry The HD digital video camcorder has 2.0 inch LCD screen, you can see the images clearly The digital video camera capture vibrant still photos that are as clear as your own memories Compact, attractive and easy to use, this best digital video camcorder can go with you anywhere The HD digital video camera can be used as PC camera, voice and picture recorder, music player and video camcorder
